website_summaries.verdict: With its portability, lightning-fast processing power, and beautiful display, the Swift 5 is a slim yet surprisingly capable ultrabook.
cons: Its 8-hour maximum battery life is passable, but it could be better

customer_reviews.title: Very lightweight and powerful, but problems with screen
customer_reviews.text: We've been using this laptop for about a month now and overall are pretty pleased. It is very lightweight, portable, and fast; everything a college student needs. However for the last two weeks, 2-3 times a day the screen fills with lines and is unreadable. It usually clears up after a few seconds, but it is very annoying. I'm worried about a potential hardware issue that will keep getting worse. Is anyone else having this issue?
customer_reviews.author: John Ahrens

customer_reviews.title: Great... But you gave to update it!
customer_reviews.text: As soon as you receive your laptop, update it, at least for two days . I received mine and the fan was really noisy. This is only because it was not updated with the new windows. Now the noise is gone. Despite this, amazing laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Leonara Barbosa da Rocha

customer_reviews.title: Laptop should be light, and this is the one
customer_reviews.text: The biggest merit of this product is the weight. I used a 13 inch laptop before, but compared to the past one, this is much lighter-! Furthermore, I got a huge discount on this product on Prime Day. ( I do love Amazin Prime-!!) If ram were 16GB, it would be more perfect but I can't find the option on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Ohsome

customer_reviews.title: Extremely lightweight.  Touch screen has had "issues"
customer_reviews.text: We bought this as a laptop for a college age child. I wish MY laptop was this lightweight!! Incredible. My child really likes it; however, there have been off and on issues with the touch screen. Not sure if it is a loose connection or software updates have caused problems with the touch screen readability or something else entirely. (Extensive software updates upon receiving it and Microsoft updates regularly). We've owned the computer just over a month. We will see how it survives college. I would buy it again providing the touch screen continues to work.
customer_reviews.author: L. Sebastian

customer_reviews.title: Good laptop with some issues
customer_reviews.text: -Be aware that this is a 14" laptop. The screen is 15.6" because it is measured diagonally. -I am updating this to 1 star after a few weeks of attempting to work with this incredibly frustrating keyboard. You have to hit the keys very hard and directly in the middle. I have developed tingling and pain in my wrists and hands after over 2 weeks of trying to type this way and caved and ordered an external keyboard to plug in - making a lightweight laptop pointless. So unhappy and regretting this purchase. Hoping I can send this in to Acer to be fixed once I return to the US.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Battery overheating
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this laptop; however, soon after I purchased it, the battery would overheat while charging to the point it was too hot to handle. After that, both speakers would start sounding intermittent raspy noises. The touch screen was great as was the keyboard, and it was fast with a long battery life. However, I am a little hesitant to order another Swift 5, although, I am looking at the Aspire 5. I considered the Swift 3, but it was sold out.
customer_reviews.author: Leigh

customer_reviews.title: Defective and probably a refurbished product
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to start configuring and working on my new computer but only managed to keep it on for a couple of minutes (or less). Long story short, the screen came defective. It wasn't cracked or scratched, but simply didn't turn on. It eventually blinked a few disconnected pixels here and there, but that was all. I turned it off and started the return process to Amazon immediately. What I was really frustrated with was that the laptop didn't come in its original package and was shipped from "Woot Returns". Moreover, UPS' package had signs of relabeling so I suspect I got a refurbished item, despite nowhere in the description it says it's a refurbished/returned product.
customer_reviews.author: Andre Krell

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly light and fast
customer_reviews.text: Have not used it enough to guage the battery, which sometimes suffers from the lightweighting. But it's incredibly nice feel, extremely light without feeling "cheap". Normally I avoid the touchscreen (gimmick) in ordering laptops, didn't notice this had one because the price is so reasonable.
customer_reviews.author: Hiccup

customer_reviews.title: Flickering Screen with black boxes
customer_reviews.text: I was excited about this product, it seemed like a good price for what I needed. When I received the product, the box was torn as if someone had attempted to open it, but otherwise the computer seemed fine. The computer seemed to be functioning fine then the screen started to malfunction. The screen would flicker with these black boxes on the screen. I returned the computer to ACER for repairs, but they reported nothing was wrong with the computer. I am contemplating returning the computer for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Kenny

customer_reviews.title: From a brick to a feather
customer_reviews.text: Been using for about 2 months now and love this thing. Went from an Asus ROG G750 weighing in around 9lbs to this feather and man it’s nice. Feels a tiny bit flimsy when opening but using the touch screen it doesn’t feel week at all. Using for basic web browsing and paying bills. Feels a bit slow when editing GoPro videos but that could be the free version of the software I’m using. All in all I like this a lot
customer_reviews.author: Omaha Bagger

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, way better then my old one. have a few issues like the fingerprint scanner does not work and am not sure if its a hardware or software problem and still haven't got answers on support on this. only other thing is the keyboard light is delayed and dims which i don't like and there is no setting for it to stay on all the time. Just tiny things that don't take away from me really enjoying the laptop. Smooth, no overheating and quite.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel R.

customer_reviews.title: Very fast and long battery
customer_reviews.text: I bought this laptop for son to use for high school. It's very fast and the battery last all day which is important since he doesn't have time to charge it during school. The touch screen is nice too. I got mine as a deal of the day saving $150 on the current price posted.
customer_reviews.author: Flynnsreview

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, great computer
customer_reviews.text: I’m really loving this computer. It’s fast, extremely lightweight and beautiful picture. Long battery life and doesn’t seem to get very hot. My only complaint is the fingerprint reader often doesn’t work and I have to enter my PIN. Regardless, I would purchase this laptop again and highly recommend it for those of us on the go. It is light as a feather!
customer_reviews.author: C W

customer_reviews.title: Great deal for this modern computer!
customer_reviews.text: Love everything about this computer,have only used it for 2 days. The back lit keyboard is a huge help for typing! So far,would highly recommend this computer! Also love the weight,very lightweight.
customer_reviews.author: G.

customer_reviews.title: This is a quality laptop.
customer_reviews.text: I normally use a MacBook Air at home. It is light and easy to use. This Acer laptop is lighter, easy to use and has a touch screen! I bought it because I needed a PC for work. You don't know what you are missing until you have a touch screen. No more fumbling with the touchpad. If you want to close something, just touch the X. Open something, just double-tap it with your finger. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Mark N.

customer_reviews.title: Best 15” laptop
customer_reviews.text: This laptop is so light I thought the box was empty. It’s very nice for a 15” laptop. The fingerprint reader works very well for me. I have no complaints, it’s been only a week but I love it thus far. I have only charged it once since I got it (it was fully charged out the box). And I’ve been using it daily for Netflix, YouTube and browsing. So battery life at the moment seems pretty great.
customer_reviews.author: Kina

customer_reviews.title: Not bad but not quite as expected
customer_reviews.text: It is very light weight. The sound quality is not great. The hard drive is small so I purchased an external drive. The speed is good though.
customer_reviews.author: lizsdogcooper

customer_reviews.title: Bloatware!
customer_reviews.text: So far the computer has been working fine, Ive only had it for a few hours. But there is so much bloatware on this unit from ACER, and all the apps they have put on there had to spend about 30 minutes just uninstalling all of it. Just a heads up
customer_reviews.author: William A Caryl

customer_reviews.title: I have had non stop issues  with the perfoanyone.
customer_reviews.text: I have had non stop issues with the performance of this product since I received it... I was also not aware that the keyboard mouse pad was not operable and apparently there for looks? I am soooo disappointed in the purchase of this product. I tried MULTIPLE time to transfer files from my phone to the laptop only to have the unit disconnect and after hours of supposable downloading and then nothing transfers. I was able to originaly sync my brand new earpods to the device to one day this also stopped working for no reason. I would definitely not recommend this product to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Langlois

customer_reviews.title: Light and sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: One of my criteria for purchase was lightness, and this laptop is delightfully light. More than powerful enough for everything I do. I LOVE the "instant on" when I open it, and the backlit keyboard is also terrific. One of the best purchases I've made in the last few years.
customer_reviews.author: Rita Karen O'Quin

customer_reviews.title: super light laptop
customer_reviews.text: Love this laptop, super light to carry around everyday; wish I had this years ago when I had to carry my laptop around in college. Fan is quiet, not noticeable; bottom of the laptop doesn't get hot like others.
customer_reviews.author: bp cuff

customer_reviews.title: Super light and fast
customer_reviews.text: Awesome computer. Very lightweight and fast. Fingerprint reader is in useable and the keyboard has some sticky keys but overall I'm very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Technerdo

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good.
customer_reviews.text: It's very light & very fast. I couldn't get the fingerprint reader to accept my fingerprint, but frankly I don't really care. I hope it lasts longer than my prior laptop which was another brand.
customer_reviews.author: BRains

customer_reviews.title: Good buy!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my daughter and she is happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super lightweight
customer_reviews.text: So light! I haven’t really tested out the battery life yet but I am very pleased with the laptop so far.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Caric

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight but compact
customer_reviews.text: Really love my new laptop, it has everything I need, good design with big screen, usb 3.1 Charing, bundled in a slim and lightweight body less than 1 kg!
customer_reviews.author: Tracey

customer_reviews.title: Get one, you will love it
customer_reviews.text: It's the best ultra portable I've had. Extra screen real estate is great.
customer_reviews.author: pl

customer_reviews.title: Defected
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful laptop, if it does not have defects. For example on my device, two keys 1 and space do not work properly and fails to react when typing. Note that if you live outsoce US or Canada you may not be abale to recive support, neither from acer, nor amazon. So you have to live with it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good laptop, good price but fixed 8GB ram you can't upgrade.
customer_reviews.text: This laptop is goo, I got it at a good price, it's fast, lightweight, etc. Major drawback, it comes with 8 GB ram, soldered to the motherboard. You can't upgrade the ram, period. my fault for not doing a through research but I couldn't imagine at this age a laptop with limited 8GB ram.
customer_reviews.author: LRBP

customer_reviews.title: Great computer for school, and general use!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome laptop. Only issue I have is the fingerprint scanner reads intermittently.
customer_reviews.author: J.San

customer_reviews.title: The worst quality
customer_reviews.text: The computer run in heat during a few months of purchase. The speakers is bad now. I have used my old HP laptop for 10 years without a problem!
customer_reviews.author: Vinh

customer_reviews.title: Good work computer
customer_reviews.text: Using it for work. Good computer. Quick boot up. Very happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Cyn30

product_meta.title: Acer Swift 5 Ultra-Thin & Lightweight Laptop 15.6” FHD IPS Touch Display in a thin .23" bezel, 8th Gen Intel Core i5-8265U, 8GB DDR4, 256GB PCIe NVMe SSD, Back-lit Keyboard, Windows 10, SF515-51T-507P
product_meta.description: Acer Swift 5 SF515-51T-507P comes with these high level specs: 8th Generation Intel Core i5-8265U Processor 1. 6GHz with Turbo Boost Technology up to 3. 9GHz (6MB Smart cache), Windows 10 Home, 15. 6" Full HD (1920 x 1080) widescreen LED-backlit IPS Multi-touch Display, Intel UHD Graphics 620, 8GB DDR4 Dual Channel Memory, 256GB Pie NV Me SSD, Optimized Dolby Audio Premium sound enhancement, Acer True Harmony Technology, Two Built-in Stereo Speakers, Intel Wireless-AC 9560 802. 11ac Gigabit Wi-Fi which can deliver up to 1. 73Gbps throughput when using 160Mhz channels (Dual-Band 2. 4GHz & 5GHz), Bluetooth 5. 0, Back-lit Keyboard, Acer Bio-Protection Fingerprint Solution, featuring Computer Protection and Windows Hello Certification, HD Webcam (1280 x 720) supporting Super High Dynamic Range (SHDR), 1 - USB Type-C ports USB 3. 1 Gen 2 (up to 10 Gbps) DisplayPort over USB Type-C & USB Charging, 2 - USB 3. 0 port (one featuring power-off charging), 1 - HDMI out with HDCP support, 3-cell Li-Ion Battery (4670 mAh), Up to 10-hours Battery Life, 2. 2 lbs. | 0. 999 kg (system unit only) (NX. H7QAA. 001)
feature_bullets: 8th Generation Intel Core i5 8265u Processor (Up to 3. 9GHz), 8GB onboard DDR4 Dual Channel Memory & 256GB Pie NV Me SSD
15. 6" Full HD (1920 x 1080) widescreen LED backlit IPS Multi Touch Display
Back lit keyboard, Intel Wireless AC 9560 802. 11AC Gigabit Wi Fi & Bluetooth 5. 0
Windows 10 Home & 3 cell Li ion (4670 mAh) battery, Up to 10 hours Battery Life
1 USB Type C ports USB 3. 1 Gen 2 (up to 10 Gaps) DisplayPort over USB Type C & USB charging, 2 USB 3. 0 port (one featuring power off charging) & 1 HDMI Port

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars88 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
